Name: RAC Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: A one-to-one Perfect Martini with extra grenadine sweetness and orange bitters adding complexity.
History: The house cocktail at the Royal Automobile Club in London's Pall Mall. King Edward VII awarded this private members' club its royal title in 1907. Adapted from a recipe in the 1933 The Green Cocktail Book written by the mysterious" Jimmy".
Nutrition: One serving of RAC Cocktail contains 185 calories
